title: Two teens killed in Pine Hills shooting, deputies say
content:
A 16-year-old boy and 18-year-old man were shot to death late Thursday night outside a Pine Hills home.
Deputies responded just before 11 p.m. to the 2300 block of Fontainebleau Drive to reports of a shooting, according to the Orange County Sheriff's Office.
The teenagers, whose names haven't been released, were lying on the ground with gunshot wounds, deputies said.
Emergency medical crews took both to a local hospital, where they died.
Deputies said witnesses saw a dark-colored vehicle driving away from the scene right after the shooting.
Detectives were called to the scene, in a neighborhood tucked between Princeton Street and Silver Star Road, about a mile east of Maynard Evans High School.
No other details about the incident have been released.
Deputies haven't released any information about a possible suspect.
sallen@orlandosentinel.com or 407-420-5417
